column1: With all the Covid-19 panic, do you think locations in Tombstone will close to the public the end of March?
As things stand now, I seriously doubt it. But we don't know how this is going to play out.
I would not be surprised to see massive closures of many large gathering places such as Tombstone, Kartchner Caverns and many other attractions
No. Itâ€™s the town too tough to die !
My crystal ball says...I don't know.
To protect visitors and staff the O.K. Corral closed until further notice on Wednesday, March 18.
